<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=5869) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon's Rage Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=5854)

</column>

---

You transform into a ferocious Large dragon, gaining the effects of 6th-rank [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1502) except that you use your own AC and attack modifier, you apply your extra damage from [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802), and the Dragon Breath action uses your class DC. Add the temporary Hit Points from _dragon form_ to any you already have from entering a rage (or any other action with the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=680) trait). The action to Dismiss the transformation gains the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=680) trait.

 At 18th level, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, your damage bonus with dragon Strikes increases to +12, and you gain a +14 status bonus to your Dragon Breath damage.
name: Dragon Transformation
